context.p: By modifying the corresponding service parameters at their subscriptions, customers can change the virtual servers provisioned in Amazon EC2. ###Are there other parameters to be modified except access data? What about User data execution?###

The modifications are carried out in asynchronous mode. As long as the update is not complete, the status of the corresponding subscription is pending update. The status changes to ready as soon as the modification has been finished successfully.
context.note: If the subscription was suspended before starting the modification, its status changes to suspended update as long as the operation is not complete.
